Key Match Events: Baris Alper Yilmaz was shown a second yellow card in the 63rd minute following a late challenge on Neco Williams
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy began his Wales managerial career with a goalless 0-0 draw against Turkiye at The Cardiff City Stadium
Bellamy described Ethan Ampadu as a future captain of the national side
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a Nations League campaign opener for Wales
The Cardiff City Stadium was the venue for the match
Others: Wales were unable to find a winning goal despite dominating the match and having a man advantage
Karl Darlow was added to the squad but did not feature in the match
